snippet: C.J. Nitkowski, who pitched for the Mets in 2001, could sign with them again soon as he seeks to return to the majors for the first time since 2005.
abstract: C.J. Nitkowski, who pitched for the Mets in 2001, could sign with them again soon as he seeks to return to the majors for the first time since 2005.

headline.main: Nitkowski's Winding Path Could Lead Back to Flushing
